components.templateData:
<comments userName="John Smith" [comments]="comments" [connector]="connector"></comments>

<document-editor 
  id="docxForComments" 
  documentServerUrl="http://192.168.0.169"
  [config]="config"
  [events_onDocumentReady]="onDocumentReady"
  height="600px"
  width="70%"
></document-editor>
